name: dom-template-strings
description: Interpolate DOM Nodes into ES2015 Template Strings

scripts.build: babel src --presets es2015 -d dist && browserify dist/index.js -o dist/dom-template-strings.js --standalone dom
scripts.prekarma: cp -f node_modules/@kapouer/template/template.js dist/ && browserify test/*.js -o dist/client-test.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.test: npm run mocha && npm run karma
